name: react-component-folder
description: An atom plugin to generate a most common react/react-native folder structure and template files

author.description: Author of the code(Default value is operating system's username)

styles.jsTemplate.default:
/**
 * @flow
 * @author: $2
 */

import { StyleSheet } from 'react-native'

const styles = StyleSheet.create({})

export default styles

story.jsTemplate.default:
/**
 * @flow
 * @author: $2
 */

import React from 'react'
import { StyleSheet, View } from 'react-native'
import { storiesOf } from '@storybook/react-native'

import $1 from './index'

const styles = StyleSheet.create({})

storiesOf('$1').add('$1', () => (
	<$1 />
))
